data.name: Gyro Gear Tournament+
data.detailed_description:
Fight other competitors and try to make them stop spinning or throw them out of the arena to win.
Attack at the right time to deflect damage and jump across the stage to get an advantage point. Figure out how to deal with each character and you'll succeed!

Tournament Mode

  • Battle and Race against 8 competitors to be the winner!;
  • Unlock new trophies, endings, characters and outfits.

VS Modes

  • Battle against the computer (CP) or against a friend (2P) locally;
  • Choose any character, any outfit and any stage.

Profiles

  • Discover more about each character;
  • Review the endings and trophies you've unlocked!

Options

  • Set the difficulty settings between Easy, Normal and Hard;
  • Set how many lives you want to use per battle;
  • And more!

data.short_description: Fight on top of giant spinning tops in this unique platform fighter!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.60 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
